author: lightclient
content:
Hey <@689161464829050960>, <@243183686562873344>, <@830368514225340436> -- here is a PR I made to geth adding more information about the actual specification of `t8n` and `b11r`. Unfortunately, there are probably quite a few implementation-defined characteristics and I think it would take a while to document them all and then we'd need to always keep them in sync with the code. So I tried to do something in the middle ground. It would be great if as you implement it you could keep a list of things you run into that we can either i) change about the tools or ii) should be better specified.
https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/pull/26111
